document.query: CREATE TABLE `career_media` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `url` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `reference_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `deleted` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `created_at` datetime NOT NULL, `updated_at` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
